properties.title: La Ferme à Gaby
properties.abstract: La Ferme à Gaby, a typical chalet of the Illiez Valley, was built in 1998 in the purest respect of the traditional methods. There, you will discover local products and cheese fabrication.
properties.description:
This farm has different rooms to explain each activity. Upstairs, you will find the barn where hay is stored. There is also a museum in which you will be able to discover the utensils used in the mountains in the past.

Downstairs, discover the cheese dairy. Cheese is made from raw milk on a fire. The impressive cauldron of 1'400 liters sits on a wooden support.

Next to the cauldron, observe the caves behind a glass display. Finally, on the ground floor, visit the small shop selling local products. Possibility of booking meals for groups of 10 to 20 people as well.
properties.name: La Ferme à Gaby
